title: Add reset and reload buttons to analytics panel

requirements.text: Add a reload button to the AnalyticsManagement component that refetches all analytics data from the backend when clicked

quotes: implement a reset and reload button on the analytics panel in admin dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: Reload button is visible in the analytics panel header
Clicking reload button triggers a refetch of analytics data
Loading state is shown during reload operation
Success feedback is provided after reload completes

requirements.text: Add a reset button to the AnalyticsManagement component that clears all analytics data in the backend and refreshes the display

quotes: implement a reset and reload button on the analytics panel in admin dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: Reset button is visible in the analytics panel header
Clicking reset shows a confirmation dialog before proceeding
Reset action calls backend method to clear analytics data
Frontend display updates to show cleared state after successful reset
Error handling is implemented if reset fails

requirements.text: Review and simplify the AnalyticsManagement component code to improve reliability and maintainability

quotes: clean up your code, if it is nesessary

acceptanceCriteria: Remove any redundant or duplicate code in AnalyticsManagement.tsx
Ensure consistent error handling patterns across all analytics operations
Simplify complex conditional logic where possible
Verify all data fetching operations have proper loading and error states

constraints: Preserve existing analytics data structure and tracking functionality
Maintain compatibility with current analytics backend methods
Do not modify the analytics data model in backend/main.mo unless necessary for reset functionality
nonGoals: Redesigning the entire analytics dashboard layout
Adding new analytics metrics beyond reset and reload functionality
Modifying other admin dashboard tabs or components
